title: NECO厨房：香煎基金会标志
content:
[[module CSS]]

.hakase{
float:right; 
width: 240px; 
margin-top: 0; 
margin-right: 0; 
margin-bottom: 10px; 
margin-left: 10px; 
padding-right: 10px;
text-align: right; 
}

.hakaseword{
color: #000000; 
background-color: #6DF560; 
font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; 
border-radius:30px /70px; 
text-align: left; 
padding: 2px 20px;
}

.joshu{
float: left; 
width: 240px; 
margin-top: 0; 
margin-right: 0; 
margin-bottom: 10px; 
margin-left: 10px; 
padding-right: 10px;
text-align: left; 
}


.joshuword{
color: #000000; 
background-color: #F899E1; 
font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; 
border-radius:30px /70px; 
text-align: left; 
padding: 2px 20px;
}

[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start-standalone]]
**标题：**NECO’S キッチン　～SCP財団ロゴのステーキ～
**作者：**©[[*user Jiraku_Mogana]]
**翻译：**[[*user BenjaminChong]]
**发布年份：**2019
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end-standalone]]


[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

各位观众早上好。
我是主持人[已编辑]博士，今天让我们一起愉快的料理吧！ 

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]
大家晚上好！我是助手[已编辑]。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[size 0%]] 在下是猫大厨请多关照[[/size]]

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

[已编辑]助手，今天我们要来做一道大菜。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

真的吗，博士。我现在的心情就好像上次用[[[SCP-056-JP]]]时一样激动！今天我们要做什么菜色呢？ 

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

今天这道大菜要用到一些适合来做大菜的大菜材料。走，我们去收集食材吧！ 

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

现在就去？这可真让我惊讶。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

出发吧！门口有我准备好的[[[scp-1365|BIKE JUSTICE]]]。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

----

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

我们到了。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

我们现在在深山老林里！究竟是要去采什么食材呢？平菇？栗茸？还是毒蝇伞？ 

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

并不是。怎么就想着去采蘑菇了？ 

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

那究竟是────

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

嘘！安静。它就在附近，可不能把它吓跑了。你看那边。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

嗯？什么东西在那边？

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E8%83%8C%E6%99%AF/medium.jpg width="300px"]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E7%99%BB%E5%A0%B4/medium.jpg width="300px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

啊！

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E8%B2%A1%E5%9B%A3%E3%83%AD%E3%82%B4%E5%BC%B7%E8%AA%BF/medium.jpg width="300px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

是基金会标志 [[footnote]] SCP基金会标志基于"Aelanna"创作的Logo SCP Foundation，在CC BY-SA 3.0协议下公开。 (https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Logo_SCP_Foundation.jpg)[[/footnote]]～～～～！！

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E7%AC%91%E9%A1%94/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

好家伙，这么大只，可是捡到宝了。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

我还是头一次看见野生的基金会标志呢。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

毕竟它们因为最近的[[[scp-4065|基金会标志排斥运动]]]数量减了不少。这几年的小孩子们甚至都以为基金会标志只生活在左上角呢。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

博士，赶紧把它抓起来吧！ 

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

[已编辑]助手，你知道基金会标志的特殊捕获措施(Special Capture Procedures)吗？
 
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]
呃……拿这把[[[SCP-572]]]给斩立决了？

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

你从哪掏出来的，放回去，不是它。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

不，可用这把剑肯定能一刀两断呀！ 

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

我们这次是要活捉的，劈成两半可不好。这剑我就没收了。
基金会标志需要用诱饵引上钩的。


[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


@@@@
@@@@

[[include component:image-block
name=控制收容保护.png|
caption=基金会标志的诱饵。|
width=200px|
align=center|
]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

来，我们设一个陷阱。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E7%BD%A01/medium.jpg width="300px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E7%BD%A02/medium.jpg width="300px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E6%8D%95%E7%8D%B2/medium.jpg width="300px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

我们抓到它了，博士！
……嗯？

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E9%96%89%E3%81%98%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AD%E3%82%B4/medium.jpg width="200px"]]

@@@@
@@@@


[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

箭头凑到一块了！
博士，这是怎么回事？！ 

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

唔，这是……

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E9%96%8B%E3%81%8F%E3%83%AD%E3%82%B4/medium.jpg width="200px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E3%81%8F%E3%81%97%E3%82%83%E3%81%BF%E3%83%AD%E3%82%B4/medium.jpg width="200px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

呃，似乎只是打了个喷嚏而已。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

啊，标志原来还会打喷嚏的吗？

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

----

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

于是我们回到了厨房。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

终于要开始做菜了吗？

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

我们先处理一下基金会标志吧。
首先，把箭头拆下来。


[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E4%B8%8B%E5%87%A6%E7%90%861/medium.jpg width="200px"]]

@@@@
@@@@


[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

本体的突起部分有苦味，所以要把它切掉。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E4%B8%8B%E5%87%A6%E7%90%862/medium.jpg width="200px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

用[[[SCP-3794]]]将本体部分敲软后，在一面上撒上盐、胡椒和██████████。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

把橄榄油倒进平底锅中，并加入蒜片炒香，然后用大火煎基金会标志。请注意，撒过盐的那一面需要向下。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E8%AA%BF%E7%90%86/medium.jpg width="200px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

往朝上的一面也撒上盐、胡椒和██████████，在另一面煎好后翻面。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]]

金黄金黄的，看上去好好吃啊！ 
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E7%AC%91%E9%A1%94/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

再煎上30秒，然后包进铝箔中，用平底锅的余温热至全熟。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

在这期间，我们来做酱料吧。请把刚刚拆下的箭头切成不影响口感的大小。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

这样可以吗？

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%88%BB%E3%81%BF%E7%9F%A2%E5%8D%B0/medium.jpg width="200px"]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

很好！然后往里加入[[[scp-2484|沙拉酱]]]、醋拌匀，塔塔酱就做好了。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

最后，把它们码在盘子里，大菜就完成了！

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


@@@@
@@@@

name= http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%AE%8C%E6%88%90/medium.jpg|

align=center|
]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

那么[已编辑]助手，请试吃一下吧。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%82%A9%E3%82%80/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

哎，这个好吃！口感香滑，肉汁满溢，太棒了！
果然新鲜的基金会标志就是不一样啊！我不由得[[[scp-2317|像巨人一样]]]把它吃光光了。

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

[[[scp-2317|巨人]]]……？
酱料你感觉如何？

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

箭头香脆爽口，沙拉酱也很配本体的莎莎酱风味。3[[[old:scp-1548|星]]]好评！

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E3%82%B0%E3%83%83%E3%83%89 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]

3个[[[old:scp-1548|星]]]……！？

[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/necos-kitchen/%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A1 width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="joshu"]]
[[div class="joshuword"]]

哎呀，好吃到飞起啊。我现在感觉我好像看到了一片花田……

[[/div]]

[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/necos-kitchen/%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E7%AC%91%E9%A1%94/medium.jpg width="120px" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="hakase"]]
[[div class="hakaseword"]]
